Codename One WebRTC Library

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
com.codename1.webrtc  

Codename One WebRTC Library

This library is an implementation of WebRTC for Codnename One.

Getting Started

RTC is the main access point for all WebRTC functionality. Obtain a reference to this class using RTC.createRTC(), as follows:

RTC.createRTC().then(rtc->{
   //  The RTC object is created.  You can now start working with it.
});

Accessing User Media: AKA Camera and Microphone Access

Use getUserMedia() on the RTC object.

E.g. (From Basic Demo)

MediaStreamConstraints constraints = new MediaStreamConstraints()
                .audio()
                .echoCancellation(true)
                .noiseSuppression(true)
                .video(true)
                .stream();


rtc.getUserMedia(constraints).then(stream->{
        RTCVideoElement video = rtc.createVideo();
        video.setAutoplay(true);
        video.setSrcObject(stream);
        rtc.append(video);
}).onCatch(error-> {
        System.out.println("Failed to get user media: "+error.getMessage());
        Log.e(error);
});

Using Peer Connections

Use com.codename1.webrtc.RTC#newRTCPeerConnection(). See PeerConnectionDemo.
